document.full_text: all five people shot dead by an elderly arizona man on thursday appear to have been targeted by him for the adversarial role they played in his bitter 2008 divorce, including his ex-wife, authorities said on friday.
document.title: gunman targeted divorce adversaries in arizona rampage
lines_and_colors: all five people shot dead by an elderly arizona man on thursday appear to have been targeted by him for the adversarial role they played in his bitter 2008 divorce, including his ex-wife, authorities said on friday.
